translations: 一股气味；臭味；一点点，些许；轻微的迹象（或感觉）；吸（喷）气；（高尔夫球或棒球）挥空棒
发臭；嗅，闻；喷出；吸气或吹气；挥空（击球未中）

sentences.sentence: It is there that a kind of alchemy occurs when we breathe up and out the passing whiffs of our chewed food.
sentences.translation: 当我们吸入和呼出咀嚼食物产生的气体时，这个部位就会发生一些神秘的变化。

sentences.sentence: So, some whiffs of roses and haddock.
sentences.translation: 玫瑰和鳕鱼的气味又来了。

sentences.sentence: He stopped work to have a few whiffs.
